display_name: Functional Outcomes of Sleep Questionnaire (FOSQ): General Productivity Score
description:
Subscore based on 8 items (mean of items 1-4 and 8-11) from Functional Outcomes of Sleep Questionnaire. A lower score suggests greater difficulty in general productivity. [Weaver et. al, 1997 (Pubmed ID: 9415942)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/9415942)

[Search for all Functional Outcomes of Sleep variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/homepap/variables?search=fosq)
